name: Ujjaini Varishtha Nagrik Sangathan
briefDescription: Sewadham Ashram is place of shelter for orphans and dying destitute. More then 350 lesser privileged  people which includes old disabled, mentally ill, physically retired, orphan children, lepers, paralysis/polio/cancer/T.B. /HIV/Aids/victims, oppressed & Unwanted mothers & victims of natural calamities.The Ashram is situated 70 Kms from Indore Airport and 15Kms from Ujjain Stn.It is set on 14 bighas of land donated by Shri SudhirBhai Goyal the Founder-Director.It is solely private funded without any Govt.Grant whatsoever.Among the inmates 90% are either mentally retarded or physically handicapped.Over 25% are senior citizens and even bedridden children are a part of the group.Presently the ashram is functioning beyond its capacity and only persons coming through Govt.agencies are admitted.The inmates are from all over India irrespective of caste,creed or religion.
